text: Pål Cappelen (born 17 February 1947) is a retired Norwegian handball player who competed in the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born in Oslo and represented the club SK Arild. In 1972, he was part of the Norwegian team which finished ninth in the Olympic tournament. He played three matches. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Norway Category:Handball players at the 1972 Summer Olympics Pal Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Pål Cappelen
